cause.description:
I am walking 60km with The Weekend to End Breast cancer, benifiting the Princess Margaret Hospital Foundation. As a participant I am required to raise $2,000.
Please visit my webpage to make a donation:
http://www.endcancer.ca/site/TR/Events/Toronto2008?px=1208763&pg=personal&fr_id=1254
1. Leading Research
2. Enhanced Clinical Care
3. Unique Survivorship Program
cause.name: The Weekend to End Breast Cancer
